body_html:
Going through the environmental variables w/ CUDA 9, these are the only variables: https://i.imgur.com/daQOiqn.png

All of the Nvidia related information is visible in the picture above.

This is the content of C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0\bin
https://i.imgur.com/wVyew2Y.png

body:
Going through the environmental variables w/ CUDA 9, these are the only variables: https://i.imgur.com/daQOiqn.png

All of the Nvidia related information is visible in the picture above.

This is the content of `C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0\bin`
https://i.imgur.com/wVyew2Y.png
